q: president. Someone close to Mike Pence explains that`` the people closest to him, the friends and people he knew best from Indiana, wanted to see him come back to Indiana.'' By contrast, the support for him to run nationally was in large part from leaders of the national conservative movement - who perhaps didn't have the same sway as his longtime supporters. Mike Pence 's young family- he has three school-aged children- were also a factor in his decision, according to this source.

that co-founder Larry Page is replacing Eric Schmidt as the company's CEO. In a blog post befitting his nice-guy reputation, Eric Schmidt wrote that he was proud of his past decade as CEO and that he was certain that the next 10 years under Larry will be even better! n't panic. They made veteran plays. The Memphis Grizzlies were hurt by their youth. Allen Iverson had 32 points and 12 assists Wednesday night, and the Nuggets used a late run to beat the Grizzlies 106-102. This was a big win for us at somebody else's home, Allen Iverson said.`` Down seven points with 3 minutes to go. It was a gut check for us.
